Title: The unseen map that promised to bring peace to the Middle East
Description:
In 2008, Israel's Prime Minister Ehud Olmert urged the Palestinian leader to agree to a two-state solution.
The map he drew has never been revealed to media - until now.

Title: Steve Jobs Would Have Celebrated His 70th Birthday Today
Description:
Apple co-founder and former CEO Steve Jobs was born on February 24, 1955, so today would have marked his 70th birthday if he hadn't passed away in 2011 at the age of 56.
In 1976, Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak co-founded Apple Computer Company to market Wo…

Title: AirPods Pro 2 Hearing Aid Feature Now Available in the UK
Description:

Title: Macron, Trump to discuss Ukraine peace plan. And, Greenpeace faces $300 million lawsuit
Description:
French President Emmanuel Macron is set to present the European peace plan for Ukraine to President Trump today.
And, Greenpeace faces a lawsuit that could shut it down.

Title: Center-right opposition wins German election, with the far right coming in 2nd
Description: Conservative opposition leader Friedrich Merz won a lackluster victory in a national election Sunday, while the far-right Alternative for Germany doubled its support, projections showed.

Title: The higher your degree, the longer you'll be unemployed
Description:
An advanced degree used to provide job security.
Those days may be gone for good.

Title: What to Know About Germany’s Election Results
Description: The far-right had its strongest showing since World War II, while the center-left Social Democrats had their worst postwar result.

Title: For Many of America’s Aging Workers, ‘Retirement Is a Distant Dream’
Description: A growing number of older employees want to stop working, but can't

Title: Amazfit Active 2 Review: the best $100 smartwatch you can buy
Description:
The Amazfit Active 2 has nearly all of the Apple Watch features but costs just $100.
It's a premium-looking price that's an excellent buy, albeit with some caveats.

Title: The End of Children
Description:
Birth rates are crashing around the world.
Should we be worried? Gideon Lewis-Kraus reports.

Title: One Word Describes Trump

Title: Why It’s Important to Talk about Race with Children
Description:
Children start learning about race and racism as early as preschool.
Talking about race early, however difficult, will help them become more antiracist

Title: The Latest on the Texas Measles Outbreak, Asteroid 2024 YR4 Risks and Fish Friends
Description: In this week’s news roundup, we cover activity from the black hole at our galaxy’s center and a troubling measles outbreak in Texas.

Title: Genetic Discoveries Could Reduce Black Women's Higher Breast Cancer Death Risk
Description:
Women with African ancestry have often been left out of breast cancer studies.
Now scientists are catching up
